entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Moosomin
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:24 AM CST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow and risk of freezing drizzle. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 16 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of light snow. High minus 7. POP 30%
